    • Method Detail

      • fetchStixAndSave

        void fetchStixAndSave(java.lang.String filePrefix,
                    org.w3c.dom.Element root,
                    java.lang.String savePath,
                    java.lang.String fileName)
        Helper function to loop through the content blocks (fetch the STIX content) and save each xml document locally
        Parameters:
        filePrefix - typically "push" or "poll" to declare how this document was obtained
        root - the root xml element
        savePath - the directory path to save the xml file
        fileName - the file name to save the xml file as [defaults to current time stamp]

      • getTimestampFromElement

        java.lang.String getTimestampFromElement(java.lang.String function,
                                       java.lang.String tsType,
                                       org.w3c.dom.Element element)
        Helper function to return a String containing the particular requested time stamp value from the supplied document
        Parameters:
        function - the calling function for debugging purposes
        tsType - String containing the precise tag name for this time stamp
        element - the root xml element
        Returns:
        String containing the requested time stamp

      • poll

        public java.lang.String poll(java.lang.String msgId,
                    java.lang.String cN,
                    java.lang.String subId,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                    java.lang.String ebt,
                    java.lang.String iet,
                    TaxiiUtil.PollParameters pollParameters,
                    java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns a String containing a TAXII XML response - the results from the poll, also saves the poll results locally
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        cN - the collection_name
        subId - the subscription_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        ebt - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp parameter
        iet - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp parameter
        cBind - a set of content bindings that the subscriber will accept
        pollParameters - TaxiiUtil.PollParameters object containing all necessary poll parameters required for the poll
        fileName - the base file name to be used for saving each content block from the poll response.
        Returns:
        String containing the TAXII XML Poll_Response message, null if failure Usage Example: Subscriber11 sub = new Subscriber11(); String subId = "12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef"; String ebt = "2014-04-28T23:19:44Z"; String iet = "2014-04-29T23:19:44Z"; String pollResults = sub.poll(null, "feed1", subId, null, ebt, iet, null, "myPollResults");

      • save

        public void save(org.w3c.dom.Document taxiiDoc,
        java.lang.String fileName)
        Strips off the TAXII portion from the supplied TAXII Inbox_Message Document and then saves the content as an XML File to the appropriate collection destination.
        Parameters:
        taxiiDoc - a TAXII 1.1 compliant Document object
        fileName - file name to save as [default is timestamp] Usage Example: Subscriber11 sub = new Subscriber11(); File taxiiMessage = new File("taxiimsg.xml"); DocumentBuilder db = ClientUtil.generateDocumentBuilder(); Document taxiiDoc = db.parse(taxiiMessage); sub.save(taxiiDoc, null);

      • save

        public void save(java.io.File taxiiMessage,
        java.lang.String fileName)
          throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Strips off the TAXII portion from the supplied TAXII Inbox_Message File and then saves the content as an XML File to the appropriate collection destination.
        Parameters:
        taxiiMessage - a TAXII 1.1 compliant XML file
        fileName - file name to save as [default is timestamp]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Usage Example: Subscriber11 sub = new Subscriber11(); File taxiiMessage = new File("taxiimsg.xml"); sub.save(taxiiMessage, null);

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String taxiiMessage,
        java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                 org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Strips off the TAXII portion from the supplied TAXII Inbox_Message String and then saves the content as an XML File to the appropriate collection destination.
        Parameters:
        taxiiMessage - a String containing TAXII 1.1 compliant XML
        fileName - file name to save as [default is timestamp]
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Usage Example: Subscriber11 sub = new Subscriber11(); String taxiiMessage = "....."; // this is the TAXII message in string format sub.save(taxiiMessage, null);

      • saveQuery

        public void saveQuery(org.w3c.dom.Document taxiiDoc,
             java.lang.String resultId)
        Saves the TAXII Poll_Request with Query parameters locally for FLAREmiddleware to retrieve
        Parameters:
        taxiiDoc - a TAXII 1.1 compliant Document object with Query parameters
        resultId - file name to save as
